title: Haiku: Missing std defines
body:
I was building some software that required net2, and noticed there are some missing defines under Haiku:

```   Compiling net2 v0.2.31
error[E0432]: unresolved import `libc::TCP_KEEPIDLE`
   --> /boot/home/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/net2-0.2.31/src/ext.rs:616:13
    |
616 |         use libc::TCP_KEEPIDLE as KEEPALIVE_OPTION;
    |             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ no `TCP_KEEPIDLE` in the root

error[E0425]: cannot find value `IPV6_ADD_MEMBERSHIP` in this scope
   --> /boot/home/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/net2-0.2.31/src/ext.rs:981:50
    |
981 |         set_opt(self.as_sock(), v(IPPROTO_IPV6), IPV6_ADD_MEMBERSHIP,
    |                                                  ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ did you mean `IP_ADD_MEMBERSHIP`?

error[E0425]: cannot find value `IPV6_DROP_MEMBERSHIP` in this scope
    --> /boot/home/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/net2-0.2.31/src/ext.rs:1000:50
     |
1000 |         set_opt(self.as_sock(), v(IPPROTO_IPV6), IPV6_DROP_MEMBERSHIP,
     |                                                  ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ did you mean `IP_DROP_MEMBERSHIP`?

error[E0308]: mismatched types
  --> /boot/home/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/net2-0.2.31/src/sys/unix/mod.rs:50:23
   |
50 |             ioctl(fd, FIOCLEX);
   |                       ^^^^^^^ expected i32, found u64

error: aborting due to 4 previous errors
```

```
> pkgman search rust -D
Repository  Name             Version     Arch  
-----------------------------------------------
<system>    rust             1.21~dev-1  x86_64
HaikuPorts  rust             1.21~dev-1  x86_64
<system>    rust_runtime     1.21~dev-1  x86_64
HaikuPorts  rust_runtime     1.21~dev-1  x86_64
```
